<a name="matchWildcard"></a>
## func matchWildcard

```go
func matchWildcard(str string, pattern string) bool
```

matchWildcard implements a simple glob\-like pattern matching \(e.g. /workspace/\*\*\). It converts internal wildcards \(\*, ?\) into regex patterns.
